Detailed Description

This class can be used to receive event callbacks from the physics engine.

In order to receive callbacks, you need to create a new class that inherits from this one and you must override the methods you need. Then, you need to register your new event listener class to the physics world using the DynamicsWorld::setEventListener() method.

Member Function Documentation

◆ beginInternalTick()

virtual void reactphysics3d::EventListener::beginInternalTick ( )
inlinevirtual

Called at the beginning of an internal tick of the simulation step.

Each time the DynamicsWorld::update() method is called, the physics engine will do several internal simulation steps. This method is called at the beginning of each internal simulation step.

◆ endInternalTick()

virtual void reactphysics3d::EventListener::endInternalTick ( )
inlinevirtual

Called at the end of an internal tick of the simulation step.

Each time the DynamicsWorld::update() metho is called, the physics engine will do several internal simulation steps. This method is called at the end of each internal simulation step.
